name: Portrait Values Questionnaire (ESS)
description: A 21-item measure of 10 basic human values from the European Social Survey. Based on Schwartz's theory of basic human values, assessing values like self-direction, stimulation, hedonism, achievement, power, security, conformity, tradition, benevolence, and universalism.
reference: Schwartz, S. H. (2003). A proposal for measuring value orientations across nations. In Questionnaire Package of the European Social Survey (pp. 259-319).
instructions: Here we briefly describe different people. Please read each description and think about how much that person is or is not like you.

questions.name: pvq_1
questions.description: Thinking up new ideas and being creative is important to him/her. He/she likes to do things in his/her own original way.

questions.name: pvq_2
questions.description: It is important to him/her to be rich. He/she wants to have a lot of money and expensive things.

questions.name: pvq_3
questions.description: He/she thinks it is important that every person in the world should be treated equally. He/she believes everyone should have equal opportunities in life.

questions.name: pvq_4
questions.description: It is important to him/her to show his/her abilities. He/she wants people to admire what he/she does.

questions.name: pvq_5
questions.description: It is important to him/her to live in secure surroundings. He/she avoids anything that might endanger his/her safety.

questions.name: pvq_6
questions.description: He/she likes surprises and is always looking for new things to do. He/she thinks it is important to do lots of different things in life.

questions.name: pvq_7
questions.description: He/she believes that people should do what they're told. He/she thinks people should follow rules at all times, even when no-one is watching.

questions.name: pvq_8
questions.description: It is important to him/her to listen to people who are different from him/her. Even when he/she disagrees with them, he/she still wants to understand them.

questions.name: pvq_9
questions.description: It is important to him/her to be humble and modest. He/she tries not to draw attention to himself/herself.

questions.name: pvq_10
questions.description: Having a good time is important to him/her. He/she likes to "spoil" himself/herself.

questions.name: pvq_11
questions.description: It is important to him/her to make his/her own decisions about what he/she does. He/she likes to be free and not depend on others.

questions.name: pvq_12
questions.description: It's very important to him/her to help the people around him/her. He/she wants to care for their well-being.

questions.name: pvq_13
questions.description: Being very successful is important to him/her. He/she hopes people will recognize his/her achievements.

questions.name: pvq_14
questions.description: It is important to him/her that the government ensures his/her safety against all threats. He/she wants the state to be strong so it can defend its citizens.

questions.name: pvq_15
questions.description: He/she looks for adventures and likes to take risks. He/she wants to have an exciting life.

questions.name: pvq_16
questions.description: It is important to him/her always to behave properly. He/she wants to avoid doing anything people would say is wrong.

questions.name: pvq_17
questions.description: It is important to him/her to get respect from others. He/she wants people to do what he/she says.

questions.name: pvq_18
questions.description: It is important to him/her to be loyal to his/her friends. He/she wants to devote himself/herself to people close to him/her.

questions.name: pvq_19
questions.description: He/she strongly believes that people should care for nature. Looking after the environment is important to him/her.

questions.name: pvq_20
questions.description: Tradition is important to him/her. He/she tries to follow the customs handed down by his/her religion or his/her family.

questions.name: pvq_21
questions.description: He/she seeks every chance he/she can to have fun. It is important to him/her to do things that give him/her pleasure.
